attributes.action: stop referring to 'hard-working families', and class all UK citizens the same despite marital status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a single person I find it increasingly annoying to hear ministers at all levels constantly refer to 'hard-working families', with no references to hard working single people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
